sentences.en: Donald Duck - the irascible but unflappablewaterfowl feed in grand fashion , as he turned 75 years old Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 唐老鸭的75岁生日,这位脾气暴躁却镇定自若的鸭先生将迎来盛大的生日庆典.

sentences.en: He had to deal with holly bushes, nettles, hawthorns, eglantines , thistles , and very irascible brambles.
sentences.cn: 他得和灌木 、 荨麻 、 出楂 、 野蔷薇 、 飞廉和一触即怒的黑莓打交道.

sentences.en: Laziness makes people irascible, and Xiangzi now grew pugnacious.
sentences.cn: 懒,能使人脾气大.祥子现在知道怎样对人瞪眼.

sentences.en: Mr Prescott's punch reminded voters that he was irascible and unreconstructed.
sentences.cn: 普雷斯科特的对打,提醒了选民他脾气暴躁思想古板.

sentences.en: She pieces of typical teenagers, lovely, irascible and lacking sense of safety.
sentences.cn: 她是个典型的青少年, 可爱 、 易怒、缺乏安全感.

sentences.en: Some of the passions belong to irascible , some to the concupiscible part of the soul.
sentences.cn: 有一些人的情欲属于嗔恚, 有一些则属于贪欲.

sentences.en: That hiss, faint as it was, irritated the irascible David.
sentences.cn: 那嘘声, 虽然很轻,却惹火了暴躁的戴维.

sentences.en: To the irascible part give spiritual love, which is opposed to hate.
sentences.cn: 对于性情中急躁的部分,就要赋予它属灵的爱, 这爱是与恨相反的.

sentences.en: Van Gogh is irascible , engaging, intelligent, touchy, high - minded , well read, rebellious and pigheaded.
sentences.cn: 梵高,富有魅力 、 聪明 、 善学 、 宽容,也显暴躁 、 敏感 、 反叛和固执.

trans.tran_cn: 易怒的，性情暴躁的，虚火上升
